content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine at position (x1)
- Boiler at position (y1)
- Offshore pump at position (z1)

### Copper plate mine at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (x1) and a furnace at position (y1)
- Burner mining drill at position (x2) and a furnace at position (y2)
- Burner mining drill at position (x3) and a furnace at position (y3)

### Copper cable factory at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine at position (z1) and inserter at position (a) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup that connects the furnace at position (y1) to the assembling machine at position (z1)

### Furnaces
- Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) - Status: NO_INGREDIENTS, Fuel: 13
- Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0) - Status: FULL_OUTPUT, Fuel: 6
- Furnace at position (2.0, 2.0) - Status: NO_INGREDIENTS, Fuel: 20

### Chest at position (5.5, 0.5)
- Contains: {'iron-plate': 160}

### Lab
- Position: (x, y) - Status: NO_POWER, Research: automation

### Electricity Group
- Contains poles at positions: (12.5, 13.5), (15.5, 15.5), (11.5, 13.5), etc.

---

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to no ingredients in furnaces
- Check that the furnaces have the required ingredients before attempting to use them. Ensure that the correct items are available in the inventory.

### Errors with lab having no power
- Ensure that the lab is connected to a power source to enable research activities.

### Errors related to crafting limits
- Monitor the available resources and ensure that you have enough materials to craft the desired items.
